[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":["The ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom"}]," package contains methods that are only supported for the web applications (which run in the browser DOM environment). They are not supported for React Native."]}]}],"
",["$r","hr",null,{}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":"These APIs can be imported from your components. They are rarely used:"}],"

",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/createPortal","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"createPortal"}]}]," lets you render child components in a different part of the DOM tree."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/flushSync","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"flushSync"}]}]," lets you force React to flush a state update and update the DOM synchronously."]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"resource-preloading-apis","children":"Resource Preloading APIs "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"These APIs can be used to make apps faster by pre-loading resources such as scripts, stylesheets, and fonts as soon as you know you need them, for example before navigating to another page where the resources will be used."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/start-a-new-react-project","children":"React-based frameworks"}]," frequently handle resource loading for you, so you might not have to call these APIs yourself. Consult your framework’s documentation for details."]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/prefetchDNS","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"prefetchDNS"}]}]," lets you prefetch the IP address of a DNS domain name that you expect to connect to."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preconnect","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preconnect"}]}]," lets you connect to a server you expect to request resources from, even if you don’t know what resources you’ll need yet."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preload","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preload"}]}]," lets you fetch a stylesheet, font, image, or external script that you expect to use."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preloadModule","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preloadModule"}]}]," lets you fetch an ESM module that you expect to use."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preinit","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preinit"}]}]," lets you fetch and evaluate an external script or fetch and insert a stylesheet."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/preinitModule","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"preinitModule"}]}]," lets you fetch and evaluate an ESM module."]}],"
"]}],"

",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"entry-points","children":"Entry points "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom"}]," package provides two additional entry points:"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom/client"}]}]," contains APIs to render React components on the client (in the browser)."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/server","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"react-dom/server"}]}]," contains APIs to render React components on the server."]}],"
"]}],"

",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://18.react.dev/reference/react-dom/hydrate","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"hydrate"}]}],": use ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client/hydrateRoot","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"hydrateRoot"}]}]," instead."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://18.react.dev/reference/react-dom/render","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"render"}]}],": use ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client/createRoot","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"createRoot"}]}]," instead."]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/unmountComponentAtNode","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"unmountComponentAtNode"}]}],": use ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/react-dom/client/createRoot#root-unmount","children":["$r","code",null,{"children":"root.unmount()"}]}]," instead."]}],"
